query.statement:
SELECT A.CONTR_S ,A.CONTR_F ,A.SDATE ,A.FDATE ,A.ZSPEC , SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR , SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.WAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS WAVWR , SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.TOTAL_T AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS TOTAL_T ,CAST(A.RATE AS DECIMAL(5,1)) AS RATE ,DEC(A.RATE_T,10,1) AS RATE_T ,DEC(A.RATE_TG,10,1) AS RATE_TG ,A.TFT , A.MAKE_MM || '01' AS MAKE_MM ,A.PSPID ,A.ERNAM --,A.ERDAT ,DEC(A.RATE_P,10,1) AS RATE_P ,A.TFT_T ,B.ZSITE_NM ,B.KUNNR_NM ,A.STEXT ,A.WAERK , SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.NETWR_MM_SUM AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR_MM_SUM , SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.TOTAL_SUM AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS TOTAL_SUM , SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.PLANSUM_SUM AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS PLANSUM_SUM , SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.LASTSUM_SUM AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS LASTSUM_SUM
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZSDTW011 AS A ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.POSID = A.PSPID
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PSPID= #PSPID# AND A.MAKE_MM = SUBSTR(#MAKE_MM#,1,6)
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
